txt.en: 'As long as we continue to help each other, the town's scars will heal.'
'Thank you. May these peaceful days continue, for all of us.'
'Nearly forgot to take care of myself in all of this.'
'Many thanks. Everyone is eager to rebuild, but that cannot happen in just a day. Our work must be slow and steady, and while we work, we must take care of each other.'
'[placeholder]! I've just refilled these water-skins. Could you hand them out to the thirsty folk around town?'
You have finished delivering water-skins to thirsty labourers in Halach.\n\nYou should talk to Gorhir at the pier.
Gorhir looks out for his fellow labourers.
There are thirsty labourers working in Halach.\n\nGorhir has asked you to bring water-skins to them.
